properties.commands:
term len 0
sh ver
send log 6 "PRE-FLIGHT: SHOW VERSION COMPLETE"

properties.script:
import re

output = '''$activity.definition_activity_02SYPDQ4Z5ZYL4v7ZhwYByNdc6RoaY1PTvL.output.response_body$'''


def _first_match(patterns, text, flags=0):
    for pattern in patterns:
        match = re.search(pattern, text, flags)
        if match:
            return match.group(1).strip()
    return ""


version = _first_match(
    [
        r"Cisco IOS XE Software, Version\s+([^\n]+)",
        r"Cisco IOS Software,\s+Version\s+([^\s,]+)",
        r"IOS\s+\([^\)]+\)\s+Software,\s+Version\s+([^\s,]+)",
        r"Version\s+([^\s,]+)",
    ],
    output,
)

model = _first_match(
    [
        r"^cisco\s+([^\s]+)\s*\(",
        r"Model Number\s*:\s*([^\n]+)",
        r"[Pp]latform\s*:\s*([^\n]+)",
        r"[Hh]ardware\s*:\s*([^,\n]+)",
    ],
    output,
    flags=re.MULTILINE,
)

serial = _first_match(
    [
        r"System Serial Number\s*:\s*([^\n]+)",
        r"Processor board ID\s+([^\n]+)",
        r"[Ss]erial [Nn]umber\s*:\s*([^\n]+)",
    ],
    output,
)

properties.commands:
term len 0
dir flash:
dir flash | inc .bin
send log 6 "PRE-FLIGHT: CHECK SPACE COMPLETE"

properties.script:
import re

output = '''$activity.definition_activity_02P2UD7LGQZH724WgYVnvYLd5gyZTkYtXXk.output.response_body$'''

free_space = ""

patterns = [
    r"bytes total \((\d+) bytes free\)",
    r"(\d+) bytes free",
    r"(\d+)\s+bytes\s+available",
]

for pattern in patterns:
    match = re.search(pattern, output)
    if match:
        free_space = match.group(1).strip()
        break

properties.commands:
term len 0
send log 6 "PRE-FLIGHT: Enough Free Space Starting Upgrade"

term len 0
send log 6 "PRE-FLIGHT: Not Enough Free Space Upgrade Halted"

actions.name: Execute Terminal Command(s)
actions.title: install EEM Script to download code

properties.commands:
conf t
file prompt quiet
no boot system
event manager session cli username josh
 event manager applet download_iosxe
  event none maxrun 3600
action 0.1 syslog priority informational msg "EEM-UPGRADE: Starting IOS-XE download process"
  action 0.2 syslog priority informational msg "EEM-UPGRADE: Target file -Â $workflow.definition_workflow_02P2W9QM5HKX310sEkbhcXLfXwqjWjKDu2J.input.variable_workflow_02SXT2FUG5D242NLYTQCzjLtS94Kp41mfGL$"
  action 1.0 cli command "enable"
  action 1.5 cli command "terminal length 0"
action 1.9 syslog priority informational msg "EEM-UPGRADE: Initiating file copy from HTTP server"
  action 2.0 cli command "copy /noverify http://$workflow.definition_workflow_02P2W9QM5HKX310sEkbhcXLfXwqjWjKDu2J.local.variable_workflow_02SXT1UNPJHR64dkHOFNMvOS9XWuY41p146$/files/$workflow.definition_workflow_02P2W9QM5HKX310sEkbhcXLfXwqjWjKDu2J.input.variable_workflow_02SXT2FUG5D242NLYTQCzjLtS94Kp41mfGL$ flash:"
action 2.5 syslog priority informational msg "EEM-UPGRADE: File download completed successfully"
  action 9.0 syslog priority informational msg "EEM-UPGRADE: download_iosxe applet finished"
 end
conf t
 event manager session cli username josh
 event manager applet upgrade_iosxe
  event none maxrun 3600
action 0.1 syslog priority informational msg "EEM-UPGRADE: Starting IOS-XE upgrade installation process"
  action 0.2 syslog priority informational msg "EEM-UPGRADE: Current version check in progress"
  action 1.0 cli command "enable"
  action 1.5 cli command "terminal length 0"
action 1.8 syslog priority informational msg "EEM-UPGRADE: Executing install add/activate/commit command"
  action 1.9 syslog priority critical msg "EEM-UPGRADE: CRITICAL - System will reload after successful install"
  !
  ! Run the install command with no prompts
  action 2.0 cli command "install add file flash:$workflow.definition_workflow_02P2W9QM5HKX310sEkbhcXLfXwqjWjKDu2J.input.variable_workflow_02SXT2FUG5D242NLYTQCzjLtS94Kp41mfGL$ activate commit prompt-level none"
  !
  ! Wait for completion or error messages
  action 2.5 cli command "" pattern "(?i)(success|completed|finished|%Error|failed)"
action 2.7 syslog priority informational msg "EEM-UPGRADE: Install command pattern match detected"
 
  !action 9.0 syslog priority informational msg "EEM-UPGRADE: upgrade_iosxe - Install command execution finished"
  action 9.1 syslog priority critical msg "EEM-UPGRADE: SYSTEM RELOAD IMMINENT - Device will reboot shortly"
 end
conf t
event manager session cli username josh
! ========================================
! EEM SCRIPT 3: Pre-Reload Alert
! ========================================
event manager applet pre_reload_alert
  event syslog pattern "INSTALL-.*-SUCCESSFUL" maxrun 60
  action 0.1 syslog priority critical msg "EEM-UPGRADE: INSTALL SUCCESSFUL DETECTED"
  action 0.2 syslog priority critical msg "EEM-UPGRADE: System reload will occur in approximately 60 seconds"
  action 1.0 cli command "enable"
  action 1.5 cli command "show version | include System image"
  action 2.0 syslog priority critical msg "EEM-UPGRADE: Current boot image captured before reload"
end
conf t
event manager session cli username josh
! ========================================
! EEM SCRIPT 5: Upgrade Status Monitor
! ========================================
event manager applet upgrade_progress
  event syslog pattern "INSTALL_" maxrun 60
  action 1.0 syslog priority informational msg "EEM-UPGRADE: Install progress update detected - $_syslog_msg"
  action 2.0 cli command "enable"
  action 2.5 cli command "show install log | tail 20"
end

conf t
event manager session cli username josh
! ========================================
! EEM SCRIPT 6: Boot-Up Notification
! ========================================
event manager applet device_rebooted
  event syslog pattern "%SYS-5-RESTART" maxrun 60
  action 0.1 syslog priority critical msg "EEM-UPGRADE: DEVICE REBOOT DETECTED - System is restarting"
  action 1.0 cli command "enable"
  action 2.0 cli command "show version | include uptime"
  action 3.0 syslog priority critical msg "EEM-UPGRADE: System uptime captured - Device has completed reload"
end
conf t
event manager session cli username josh
! ========================================
! EEM SCRIPT 7: Error Detection
! ========================================
event manager applet upgrade_error_detect
  event syslog pattern "%INSTALL.*ERROR|%INSTALL.*FAIL" maxrun 60
  action 0.1 syslog priority critical msg "EEM-UPGRADE: ERROR DETECTED during installation process"
  action 0.2 syslog priority critical msg "EEM-UPGRADE: Critical failure - $_syslog_msg"
  action 1.0 cli command "enable"
  action 2.0 cli command "show install log | tail 50"
  action 3.0 syslog priority critical msg "EEM-UPGRADE: Install error log captured for analysis"
end

! Save configuration
write memory
properties.display_name: install EEM Script to download code

actions.name: While Loop
actions.title: Poll for code to be downloaded

properties.display_name: Poll for code to be downloaded

properties.script:
import re

output = '''$activity.definition_activity_02P2YASOCW4IZ41u4na7MxR9BKdSXc55WBH.output.response_body$'''

checksum = ""

patterns = [
    r"=\s*([a-fA-F0-9]{32})",
    r"MD5\s*:\s*([a-fA-F0-9]{32})",
    r"verify.*?([a-fA-F0-9]{32})",
]

for pattern in patterns:
    match = re.search(pattern, output, re.IGNORECASE)
    if match:
        checksum = match.group(1).strip()
        break

actions.name: Execute Terminal Command(s)
actions.title: SYSLOG MD5 Send Both Calc and Expected

properties.commands:
send log 6 "EEM-UPGRADE: Caculated Checksum - $activity.definition_activity_02P2YBXAYRTFC7MeytwE5KaXa3mroQ53XJL.output.script_queries.checksum$"
send log 6 "EEM-UPGRADE: Expected Checksum - $workflow.definition_workflow_02P2W9QM5HKX310sEkbhcXLfXwqjWjKDu2J.input.variable_workflow_02SXTDEDAGRWA17mfIp7arrWBZcF29aa1vz$"
properties.display_name: SYSLOG MD5 Send Both Calc and Expected
